name: Linen Background for Google Docs
description:
This userstyle adds an iOS inspired linen background to your Google Documents. 

It also changes the document title font to Georgia and removes some padding on the file menu so that it sits flush when you go to view > compact controls.

user.name: mattthink
user.about: I'm Matt Williams and I'm a journeyman philosopher and technologist. Find me on Twitter at www.twitter.com/mattthink I do a little web design and marketing consulting for friends I'm happy to work with. John - Mobile Car Detailing Brisbane Brian - Cash for Cars Brisbane
